root.name: Prophecy 1: The Viking Child
root.description: Prophecy I - The Viking Child was developed by Imagitec Design Limited and released on various platforms: Amiga, Atari ST, Commodore Amiga, Atari Lynx, Game Boy, Game Gear and PC. The game is a side-scrolling action-RPG in which a young ‘Viking Child’ battles his way through side scrolling levels and then navigates between levels via an overhead world map.Viking Child is similar to Wonder Boy in Monster Land, another side-scrolling action-RPG of the era. Viking Child is often remembered as the inferior clone of Wonder Boy in Monster Land.
